Reviews.Title: “One night stay over before skiing”
Reviews.Author: Ashbyrich
Reviews.Content: Comfortable stop over place on the way to skiing in Andorra. Friendly place with a comfortable room in a nice area, away from main tourist zone.

Reviews.Title: “Good location but average service”
Reviews.Author: SatishAnsingkar
Reviews.Content: City of Barcelona is curious mix of Modern & rustic. It also has the little more warm than very cold countries. the sea shore is remarkable. the small hillocks on east sie of city make it even better. The location of Hotel Husa Pedralbes is fantastic but the Hotel does not have restaurant of it's own. The rooms are little too small. The TV has just about 3-4 channels

Reviews.Title: “Out of the way”
Reviews.Author: reatigger
Reviews.Content: This hotel is away from the centre but not far from University. It is in a nice area, with some shops and restaurants around. Helpful and friendly service at the front desk. My corner room in the back was small but quiet due to double doors. The front of the hotel is on a fairly busy street. Bathroom a bit dated, rust around shower screen. Breakfast OK.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely service”
Reviews.Author: PaulaPops
Reviews.Content: Spent a weekend in this hotel and really enjoyed the level of service provided by the staff. The hotel itself was beautifully decorated and staff were helpful without being intrusive. The hotel is a little out of the way for the centre, but only a short walk to the Nou Camp and the metro is handy too. Would definitely stay here again.

HotelInfo.Name: Husa Pedralbes
HotelInfo.Address: Fontcuberta 4, 08034 Barcelona, Spain
